Author: Anna, maintained by Khayle
Name: Namingway
Changelog: - Added Occult Crescent actions to the Player Actions filter - Added commands (/namingway <enable|disable|toggle> <GUID>) - Added a GUID field to copy/paste them for macros use - Added the ID of actions in the edit window to differentiate actions with the same name - Fixed an issue with names not being updated at some times
